posts.post_title: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300  Hugh Duffy   SGC  $600
posts.post_content: 1895 Mayo Cut Plug  N300   Hugh Duffy   Graded Authentic by SGC---upper left corner looks to have a touch at the black---real nice card--other than the upper corner, card would grade SGC 40---check front and back scans--selling for $600----email me if you are looking for any other Mayo Baseball---thanks,  Don    [url]dhontz1@maine.rr.com[/url]
